description:
Rebecca`s battle continues, a madman turns a gladiator into a play thing, and the brave little toy soldier reveals his painful past – and the tragic truth behind King Riku`s fall from power!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Surprise! A True Identity of the Toy Soldier!
Révélation. La vérité sur le Soldat jouet !
Shougeki! Omocha no Heitai no Shoutai!
مفاجأة كبيرة! هويّة الجنديّ الدّمية الحقيقيّة!
衝撃! おもちゃの兵隊の正体!
